content.body: I'm confused as to why sometimes I see a source map with multiple sources but only a single sourcesContent. I think it's when you use a bundler but I guess I would have thought that whenever you have multiple `sources` you'd have the same number of `sourcesContent`
content.formatted_body: I'm confused as to why sometimes I see a source map with multiple sources but only a single sourcesContent. I think it's when you use a bundler but I guess I would have thought that whenever you have multiple sources you'd have the same number of sourcesContent
